examples.example: 我家的洗衣机帮妈妈减轻了很多洗衣的负担。

translate.english: The washing machine in my home has helped my mother reduce a lot of the burden of doing the laundry.

examples.example: 那台洗衣机快速地转动着，将衣物清洗得干干净净。

translate.english: That washing machine is rotating rapidly and cleaning the clothes very clean.

examples.example: 那台洗衣机安静地工作着，为我们的生活带来了便捷和舒适。

translate.english: That washing machine is working quietly, bringing convenience and comfort to our life.
